Newton's Principia

To paraphrase Alexander Pope "Nature and Nature's laws lay hid in night: Thus Nature said, Let Newton be! and all was light." You can find a translated digital copy of Newton's Principia here[11].

Light Speed – fast, but slow

Royal Institution Christmas Lectures

The Royal Institution Christmas Lectures[19] are a series of lectures on a single topic each, which have been held at the Royal Institution in London each year since 1825. The lectures present scientific subjects to a general audience, including young people, in an informative and entertaining manner.
Take a look at Highlights from the Christmas Lectures Archive[20] (51 videos) on YouTube's Royal Institution Channel[21].
Visit YouTube's Popular Royal Institution Christmas Lectures & Royal Institution[22] for more.
